name: pccld
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn0), wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, (c0[pCnt]c1)∈ ℕ0, c0 ∈ Prime, c1 ∈ ℕ)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cprime))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)), wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0[pCnt]c1)∈ ℕ0)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Prime)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℕ)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ)→(c0[pCnt]c1)∈ ℕ0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cprime))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)), wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0[pCnt]c1)∈ ℕ0)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Prime)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℕ)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ)→(c0[pCnt]c1)∈ ℕ0)

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)), wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cprime))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn))

comment: Closure of the prime power function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
